parameters.textBody: There you gou. Now you just need to forward it.

=Hi {{ $('Chat start').item.json.messages[0].text.body.split(' ')[0]  }}, {{ $('Regenerate variables sender').item.json.Sender }} is sharing this Angel Canvas Gift Card with you. 

It will give you the tools to suceed in your angel investor journey and help you avoid costly mistakes.

Many investors around the world have found it useful, and we hope you will too.

https://tally.so/r/n9MY2V
Want another one? Just type their first and last name.
